snippet: The recent spate of gruesome self-immolations by Tibetans - and their effect on international opinion - have clearly registered with the authorities in Beijing. With the Communist Party holding its landmark gathering, security officials in orange...
abstract: The recent spate of gruesome self-immolations by Tibetans - and their effect on international opinion - have clearly registered with the authorities in Beijing. With the Communist Party holding its landmark gathering, security officials in orange jumpsuits have been deployed outside the Great Hall of the People - fire extinguishers at the ready.

headline.main: In Beijing, Fire Brigades at the Ready

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
